detail_desc: Fully lined bikini top with frills. Non fasteners.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, small, ribbed stand-up collar and two-way zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the hem and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Double-layered trims at the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with two flounces at the front and narrow shoulder straps, one with a small metal pendant.

Warm-lined jacket in imitation leather with notch lapels, a diagonal zip at the front and welt side pockets. Adjustable tabs with metal buckles at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Faux fur lining.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow. Broderie anglaise frill trim at the front and short legs with narrow elastication at the hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps and a mesh racer back. Elastic hem and a fastening at the back. Light support.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with pearly buttons, a turn-down collar, French front and one chest pocket. Gently tapered waist, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Low-rise joggers in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a zip at the hems.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, appliqué on the tongue and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour integral sports bra. Bra with a double-layered front, elasticated hem and racer back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the shoulders. Two concealed buttons at the top, and a rounded hem.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a double-layered polo neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in viscose jersey with overlocked edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Regular elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs in a double layer with slits in the sides and scalloped hems.
Short shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Gently fitted, lightweight down jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorter imitation suede jacket with imitation leather details. Large pile collar with double tabs, a diagonal zip at the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Wide pull-on trousers in stripe-print viscose crêpe with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs with a seam at the hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cap in a felted wool and cashmere blend with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, concealed pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, a deep neckline at the back with crossover straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Hat in braided paper straw with a band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in a soft, organic cotton double weave with elastication at the waist, crossover straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Two-strand necklace of metal chains in different designs, one with a pendant. Adjustable length.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable foot and ankle straps with a metal buckle, and fluted soles. Height of soles 1.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the top and sleeve-ends.

Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathers at the front and elastication at the back, and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in patterned slub jersey with a V-neck and gathers in the sides for a more comfortable fit.
Thin, patterned socks with a short shaft.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, oversized shirt in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar and concealed button band down the front. Low dropped shoulders, extra-long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. The shirt has a pleat at the back to create volume and soft draping that is concealed by a loose yoke. Slits in the sides.

Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Rounded collar with broderie anglaise and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: SB Kurt Cord Logg mini me
detail_desc: Jacket in cotton corduroy with a pile collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Partly lined in pile.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.

Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a viscose crêpe weave with smocking and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with smocked trims, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved “Best friends” tops in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Three with a print motif.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing at the sleeve-ends and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in sturdy jersey with a woven collar in a contrasting colour. Dropped shoulders, concealed button placket and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and a woven flounce with broderie anglaise.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Lightweight jacket in soft faux shearling with flatlock seams, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front welt pockets and jersey trims around the opening, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a tie belt at the waist and short, frilled sleeves with overlocked edges.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.

Fitted, sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow cut at the top and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Skirt with a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in inner dress.
Imitation suede slippers with soft pile linings and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved sports jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Print motif on the back and sleeves.

Coat in soft imitation suede with a collar, wrapover front and a tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders with front-facing shoulder seams, discreet side pockets, and a single back vent. No buttons. Lined.
Earrings in metal with a plastic bead and asymmetric hoop pendants. Diameter approx. 3 cm, length approx 4.5 cm.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist and a fake fly. Side and back pockets, and ribbed hems.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Straight-cut shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Rounded hem.

Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, ankle-length legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases.
Cap-sleeved top in softly draping jersey with a double-layered stand-up collar that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top, and a smocked hem.
